CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, June 8, 1957, pg. A13, reads: "Magic Surrounds Girl Friends' Pittsburgh Meet - Gay Columbusites - One of the largest contingents of GF's came from Columbus, Ohio. Snapper at the brunch, they are, seated, Lucille Roan, Wilma McClung, Maxine Hamlar, Betty Brewer.  Standing: Minnie White, Roberta Basnett, Adoria Whitaker, LaVerne Dukes, Kay McGill and Rosalie Rosemond."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of eleven women from Columbus, Ohio, seated from left: Lucille Roan, Wilma McClung, Maxine Hamlar, and Betty Brewer; standing: Minnie White, Roberta Basnett, Adoria Whitaker, LaVerne Dukes, Kay McGill, and Rosalie Rosemond, in Penn-Sheraton Hotel for Thirtieth Anniversary Convention of Girl Friends, Inc. brunch
